data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Phayao, Thailand.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phayao, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Phayao to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 3,317 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 513,000 people living in Phayao.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Mok people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Phayao, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Phayao, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Phayao you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

location.name: Phayao
location.cities_list: Dok Kham Tai, Phayao, Pong, Chiang Kham, Mae Chai
location.cities_list_w_pop: Dok Kham Tai (23,824), Phayao (21,058), Pong (14,392), Chiang Kham (14,092), Mae Chai (5,094)
